output: Artificial neural networks are the most commonly used deep learning models because they are able to approximate non-linear functions. They structure their operations as a network of nodes and can accurately process complex data inputs more accurately than traditional machine learning algorithms. Additionally, they have the ability to self-adjust their parameters, making them better able to understand and learn from complex data.
instruction: Explain why artificial neural networks are the most commonly used deep learning models.

output: If a person jumps off a cliff, they could suffer severe injuries or even death due to the fall. Depending on the height of the cliff, they could experience a free fall of several seconds before hitting the ground. If they do not jump far enough away from the cliff, they could also hit the rocks and cause serious injuries.
instruction: Describe what would happen if a person jumps off a cliff
